mapper.select: SELECT rr.flow_recruit AS flow_recruit, rr.candidate_openid AS candidate_openid, rr.recruiter_openid AS recruiter_openid, rr.company_uuid AS company_uuid, rr.job_uuid AS job_uuid, rj.job_name AS job_name, rj.company_name AS company_name, rc.portrait_path AS portrait_path, rj.job_salary_max AS job_salary_max, rj.job_salary_min AS job_salary_min, ur.telephone AS telephone, ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE( POINT(#{location.longitude}, #{location.latitude}), POINT(rc.`lon`, rc.`lat`)) AS `distance` FROM recruit_record rr LEFT JOIN recruit_job rj ON rr.job_uuid = rj.id LEFT JOIN user_recruiter ur ON rr.recruiter_openid = ur.id LEFT JOIN recruit_company rc ON rr.company_uuid = rc.id WHERE rr.status != -1 AND rj.status != -1 AND rc.status != -1 AND rc.flag_identification = 1 AND rr.candidate_openid = #{candidateOpenid} ORDER BY distance ASC
